base_mods.misc_desc: Reduces range band of enemy ships' passive sensors by 1 (to a minimum of close range) for detecting the Tallanx.
All power for shields and weapons must be rerouted to device for it to work.  Rerouting takes one action.

Immediately notifies all ships in a star system or within 100 kilometers if planetside to the ship or vehicle's existence.

name: Astrogation Droid Brain
description: Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a Droid Brain with Astrogation Skill 2 and Intellect 0

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase Droid Brain's Astrogation Skill by 1

name: Autopilot Droid Brain
description: Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a Droid Brain with Piloting Skills 2 and Intellect 0
May summon vehicle via a beckon call.

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase Droid Brain's Piloting Skills by 1

name: AX-108 "Ground Buzzer" Surface-Defense Blaster Cannon
description: Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds one AX-108 Surface Defense Blaster Cannon weapon
Can fire automatically with a Ranged (Heavy) skill of 2 and an Agility of 0

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase the weapon's automated Ranged (Heavy) skill by one

name: Cloaked Smuggling Compartments
description: Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook, for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Increases difficulty of checks made to find compartment by 3.

name: Set Trigger
description: Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Automatic [SU][TH] to the first combat check made with this weapon each encounter.

added_mods.misc_desc: Adds [SU] to the first combat check made with this weapon each encounter

name: Overcharge Valve
description: Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As incidental, weapon gains Prepare 1 quality and +4 damage for next attack.  After firing, weapon runs out of ammo.

name: Paired Weapons
description: Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduce [AD] required to hit with second weapon when two-weapon fighting by 1.

name: Underslung Scattergun
description: Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a scattergun to the weapon.

name: Starhawk Sidecar
description: Please see page 53 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

name: Interior Broadcast Suite
description: Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Increases the strain threshold of each crewmember by 1

name: Nightshadow Coating
description: Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduces range of enemy ship's passive sensors by 1 (minimum of close range) for detecting a vessel with nightshadow coating.

added_mods.misc_desc: Reduce the ship's silhouette by 1 in combat

name: Onboard Amenities Unit
description: Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrades ability of Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks while aboard once.

name: Rapid Cargo Evacuation Chute
description: Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] as an action while in the cockpit or cargo bay to eject everything currently stored in the cargo hold.

added_mods.misc_desc: May instead be activated as an action without making a check Mod.

name: Whisperthrust Engine
description: Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Increases the difficulty of checks to detect this vessel by two while it is traveling at speed 3 or lower.

name: Advanced Subspace Encryption Array
description: Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Only the intended recipient can detect a transmission  sent with this attachment without a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Upgrade the difficulty of any checks to intercept or decipher transmissions made from this attachment once.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to enemy detection check
Add [SE] to enemy interception or deciphering check

name: Luxury Passenger Compartments
description: Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [BO] to all Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks made against passengers within the vehicle.  Checks made against passengers who are accustomed to opulence and luxury have up to [SE][SE] removed instead.

name: Holonet Pirate Array
description: Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Transmissions sent with this attachment can reach any facility that has access to interstellar communications.  Transmissions can be intercepted with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b], provided someone is aware of the transmission.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to enemy checks to intercept outgoing transmissions.
Add [BO] to intercept HoloNet traffic

name: Environmental Simulators
description: Please see page 64 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Can replicate up to three different planetary environments, one at a time.  When making Charm or Negotiation checks against members of species native to replicated environment, add an automatic [AD][AD] to pool.

added_mods.misc_desc: Additional planetary environment

name: Engineering Access
description: Please see page 61 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Anyone working on internal systems, such as power systems, hyperdrive, computers, sensors, gain [BOOST] to Mechanics and Computer checks due to the ease of reaching such typically hidden systems.

name: ANQ 3.6 Tracking Computer
description: Please see page 60 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Choose one target and make [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Computers check[b].  If successful, combat checks against target are upgraded once. [SU][SU][SU] or [TR] allows additional target.

name: Engine Ring Stabilizer
description: Please see page 82 of the [B]Mask of the Pirate Queen[b] adventure module for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When rolling for initiative, or attacking with its Insatiable Maw, a space slug rolls a [B]Coordination skill check[b], counting as having Coordination 3 and Agility 1 ([PR][AB][AB]).

A starship of silhouette 5 or lower attacked by a space slug, regardless of whether or not the attack hit, must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Space) check[b] to avoid  being swallowed.  If swallowed, ship suffers 10 hull trauma daily from being digested.
The stomach of an space slug is also generally home to mynocks, which will waste no time attacking a swallowed starship.

name: Briefing Auditorium
description: Please see page 58 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Characters briefed in this auditorium prior to a mission remove [SE] due to known mission conditions from skill checks for the duration of the mission.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [AD] to Leadership checks made by characters within the briefing auditorium

name: Electronic Counter-Countermeasures Suite
description: Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to cancel all effects of an electronic countermeasures suite.

added_mods.misc_desc: Decrease difficulty of the Computers check by 1

name: Holo-Tank
description: Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Characters utilizing a holo-tank may always use Cool or Knowledge (Warfare)  when making Initiative checks.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [AD] to Mass Combat checks when acting force commander is on board this ship
Upgrade the ability of checks when determining Initiative once

name: Tactical Command, Control, and Communications Suite
description: Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: While active, a force commander in the vehicle upgrades the ability of all Mass Combat checks once

added_mods.misc_desc: Allies benefiting from Situational Awareness remove [SE] on Perception and Vigilance checks

name: Theater Command and Control System
description: Please see page 59 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: While active, force commander on the bridge upgrades the ability of all Mass Combat checks twice

added_mods.misc_desc: Gain an additional [AD] on Mass Combat checks
Remove [SE] from Mass Combat checks

name: Shaped Nozzle
description: Please see page 45 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Pressurized Gas Cartridge
description: Please see page 45 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Top-Loading Magazine
description: Please see page 46 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Balanced Barrel
description: Please see page 46 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Custom Grip
description: Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Anyone other than owner adds [SE][SE] to combat checks using this weapon.

name: Enhanced XCiter
description: Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: GM may spend [DE][DE] to cause blaster to explode, destroying blaster and inflicting automatic Critical Injury on wielder.

name: Gyrostabilizer
description: Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Integrated Scanner
description: Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Weapon incorporates a general-purpose scanner.
Wielder adds automatic [AD][AD] to Initiative checks while weapon is drawn.

added_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE] from Initiative checks

name: Optimized Energy Cell
description: Please see page 54 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When GM spends [DE] or [TH] to cause the weapon to run out of ammo, it requires an additional [TH].

name: Overcharged Actuating Module
description: Please see page 55 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: GM may spend [TH][TH] to damage weapon by one step.

name: Rapid-Recharge XCiter
description: Please see page 55 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Removed Safety Features
description: Please see page 55 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds [BO] to first combat check during an encounter.
GM may spend [TH][TH] to cause misfire.  Weapon runs out of ammo and inflicts 4 strain on wielder.

name: Secondary Ion Blaster
description: Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds an ion blaster to the weapon.

name: Sonic Scope
description: Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May observe and target enemies who are completely hidden by solid objects.

name: Stripped Down
description: Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to Perception checks to find the weapon when hidden.

name: Under-Barrel Grapnel Launcher
description: Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As an action, may make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Ranged (Light) check[b] to secure grappling hook to an object within medium range and reel in cord.
May pull another character aloft by making an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Athletics check[b].

name: Vibro-Bayonet
description: Please see page 56 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a vibro-bayonet to the weapon

name: Amphibious Modification
description: Please see page 57 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Provides up to five hours of oxygen in submersive or airless environments.  Does not protect against vacuum.
Removes [SE] from physical checks due to underwater conditions.

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase oxygen supply by two hours

name: Custom Fit
description: Please see page 57 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Removes [SE] from Athletics and Stealth checks.

added_mods.misc_desc: Remove an additional [SE] from Athletics and Stealth checks

name: Integrated Ascension Gear
description: Please see page 57 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As an action, may make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Ranged (Light) check[b] to secure grappling hook to an object within medium range and reel in cord.
May pull another character aloft by making an [B]Easy ([DI]) Athletics check[b].

name: Integrated Slicer Gear
description: Please see page 58 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Counts as having Slicer Gear.  Can be controlled by gesture or voice.

name: Ion Shielding
description: Please see page 58 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Increase soak by 3 against weapons with Ion quality.

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase ranged and melee defense by 1 against weapons with Ion quality

name: Radiation Shielding
description: Please see page 58 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add [BO][BO] to Resilience checks to resist radiation.

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase armor's soak by 1 against damage caused by radiation

name: Reinforced Gauntlets
description: Please see page 58 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May use gauntlets as a melee weapon.

name: Self-Repair Systems
description: Please see page 58 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Once per encounter as a maneuver, can have armor attempt to repair itself or assist in a repair.  Counts as Intellect 2 and Mechanics 2 ([PR][PR]).
There is no cost to repair armor, whether using the automatic feature, or personally repairing.

name: (AD-1S) Cargo Pod
description: Please see page 62 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: (AD-1S) Fine-Tuned Microthrusters
description: Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: (AD-1S) Hyperdrive Class 8 Module
description: Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add astromech droid socket.

name: (AD-1S) Hyperdrive Class 4 Module
description: Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add astromech droid socket.

name: (AD-1S) Shield Generator Module
description: Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: (AD-1S) Sublight Boost Thrusters
description: Please see page 63 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: All-Terrain Legs
description: Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As a maneuver, pilot may shift in or out of walker mode.  In walker mode, pilot uses Piloting (Planetary) and speed is reduced to 2.

added_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE] from Piloting (Planetary) checks due to difficult terrain
Remove [SE] from Gunnery checks due to cover or terrain

name: Amphibious Modification
description: Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Vehicle can operate underwater without penalty.

name: Decoy Buoy
description: Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Buoy may be jettisoned as an action.
Buoy can be programmed with a specific transponder code with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Buoy can be set to transmit a distress signal or other data.
A character operating ship sensors must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to identify that the buoy is not an actual ship.
After being jettisoned, buoy no longer counts as being attached to the ship until it is reattached.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to Computers checks to identify the buoy

name: Encrypted Computer
description: Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrade difficulty of all Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer system once.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer systems

name: Encrypted Computer
description: Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrade difficulty of all Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer system once.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to Computers checks made to slice the ship's computer systems

name: Enhanced Hyperspace Shields
description: Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Downgrade difficulty of Astrogation checks made to navigate the ship through hyperspace once.

added_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE] from Astrogation checks made to navigate the ship through hyperspace

name: Enhanced Repulsorlift
description: Please see page 65 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Gunnery Droid Brain
description: Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add a droid brain with Gunnery 2 and Agility 0.

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase the droid brain's Gunnery skill by 1

name: Laser Focusing Array
description: Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Add automatic [AD] to combat checks made with the ship's laser cannons and turbolasers.

name: Overcharged Ion Engines
description: Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

name: Pseudo-Cloaking Device
description: Please see page 66 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Increase the difficulty of checks to detect the ship with sensors by two.
Upgrade the difficulty of all combat checks once against the ship at Short range or further.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to combat checks targetting ship at Short range or further

name: Secondary Transponder
description: Please see page 67 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Crew can switch to the secondary transponder as an action, making an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
An observer who scans the ship can detect discrepancies indicating the presence of a secondary transponder with a [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].

added_mods.misc_desc: Activate secondary transponder as a maneuver
Add one additional ship identity

name: Security Measures
description: Please see page 67 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Upgrade the difficulty Computers and Skulduggery checks made to gain unauthorized access to the ship twice.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to Computers and Skulduggery checks made to gain unauthorized access to the ship

name: Slicing Computer
description: Please see page 67 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Counts as slicer gear that can be used by one passenger.
Add automatic [AD] to Computers checks made to slice enemy ships' systems.

name: Pannier Modular Cargo Handling System
description: Please see page 46 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

name: XV-09 Chemical Restraint Harness
description: Please see page 44 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Pacified beasts gain [BOOST] to any [B]Displine Checks[b].

name: Riding Tack
description: Please see page 47 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Characters may ride beast without suffering bareback riding penalties.

name: Saddlebags
description: Please see page 47 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.

name: Beam Splitter
description: Please see page 51 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

name: Built-In Blaster Sight
description: Please see page 51 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Remove [SE] added by the Called Shot use of the Aim maneuver from Ranged Light and Ranged Heavy checks.

name: Galven Pattern Resequencing
description: Please see page 51 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds automatic [TH][TH] to all combat checks made using this weapon.

name: Temperature Control Unit
description: Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Removes up to [SE][SE] from checks to resist extreme heat or cold.

name: Power Unit
description: Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May recharge a depleted piece of equipment as an action, or a droid or larger piece of machinery in two hours.
Once per encounter, wearer may ignore an "out of ammo" [DE] result in the same manner as an Extra Reload.

name: Comms Unit
description: Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May route communications up to long range on the planetary scale.
Adds [SE][SE] to checks made to unscramble the unit's signal.

name: Sensor Unit
description: Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds [AD] to Vigilance checks.

name: Oxygen Unit
description: Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds additional twelve hours of oxygen when connected to any rebreather, breath mask, or sealed suit.

name: Storage Unit
description: Please see page 55 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.

name: Damping Emitter
description: Please see page 51 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As a maneuver, my adjust lightsaber to deal Stun damage.  Decrease damage by 2, increase critical rating by 1, lose Breach quality.

added_mods.misc_desc: Stun Damage +1

name: Overcharged Power Cell
description: Please see page 51 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wielder can spend [AD] from combat checks to increase damage by 1.  GM can spend [TH][TH] to decrease damage by 1.

name: Pistol Hilt
description: Please see page 52 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Includes a built-in blaster pistol.

name: Reflex Grip
description: Please see page 52 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When lightsaber is used to Parry or Reflect, suffer 1 additional strain, but count Parry and Reflect ranks as 1 higher.

name: Shien Reverse Grip Customization
description: Please see page 52 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wielder adds [AD] to all Lightsaber (Cunning) checks, but adds [TH] to all other Lightsaber checks.

name: Etaan Crystal
description: Please see page 52 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: If wielder uses the Improved Reflect talent to inflict an automatic hit, increase damage by 2.

name: Ghostfire Crystal
description: Please see page 53 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Wielder may spend [AD][AD][AD][AD] or [TR] to prevent the target from using the Parry talent to reduce damage from this attack.

name: Paramilitary Airspeeder
description: Converts an airspeeder to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a forward light blaster cannon

name: Paramilitary Cloud Car
description: Converts a cloud car to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a forward light auto-blaster

name: Paramilitary Landspeeder
description: Converts a landspeeder to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a medium laser turret

name: Paramilitary Walker
description: Converts a walker to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a forward medium laser cannon

name: Paramilitary Wheeled/Tracked
description: Converts a wheeled or tracked vehicle to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a medium laser cannon turret

name: Paramilitary Speeder Bike/Swoop
description: Converts a speeder bike or swoop to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds a forward light repeating blaster

name: Paramilitary Light Freighter
description: Converts a light freighter to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds two quad laser cannon turrets

name: Paramilitary Medium Transport
description: Converts a medium transport to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds two medium laser cannon turrets

name: Paramilitary Bulk Transport
description: Converts a bulk transport to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds two heavy laser cannon turrets

name: Paramilitary Shuttle
description: Converts a shuttle to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds two twin light laser cannon turrets

name: Paramilitary Yacht
description: Converts a yacht to a paramilitary vehicle.  Please see page 71 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Adds two forward light laser cannons and one aft light laser cannon

name: Collision Avoidance System
description: Please see page 58 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduce silhouette by 1 for purposes of determining difficulty of Piloting checks.

name: Podracer Ejection System
description: Please see page 58 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: To eject, make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Piloting (Planetary) check[b] as an out-of-turn incidental.  On success, pilot is ejected unharmed.  On failure, pilot suffers vehicle speed in strain, plus one Critical Injury.  GM can spend [TH][TH] or [DE] to cause wounds to be suffered instead.

name: Engine Boost System
description: Please see page 58 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

name: Foreign Debris Ejector
description: Please see page 58 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Ejects debris into the air behind podracer.  Any racer within close range and behind must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Planetary) check[b] to avoid debris.  Failure reduces speed by 1 for 2 rounds, plus 1 round per [TH].  [TH][TH][TH] or [DE] can inflict Critical Hit on target vehicle.
May only be used once per race.

name: Handling Upgrades
description: Please see page 59 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

name: High-Output Repulsor Coils
description: Please see page 59 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

name: Reinforced Engine Cowlings
description: Please see page 59 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Reduce Critical Hit result from collision by 20

added_mods.misc_desc: Reduce Critical Hit result from collision by 20

name: Podracer Shield Generator
description: Please see page 59 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

name: Podracer Control Cables
description: Please see page 60 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

name: Podracer Engine
description: Please see page 60 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

name: Rocket Guidance System
description: Please see page 47 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Staged Rocket Booster
description: Please see page 47 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Marked-Target Firing Lock
description: Please see page 51 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Shock Pulse Emitter
description: Please see page 51 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Under-Barrel Micro-Rocket Rack
description: Please see page 51 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Enables weapon to fire loaded micro-rockets.

name: Integrated Holsters
description: Please see page 52 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

added_mods.misc_desc: Add [SE] to Perception checks to find stored weapons

name: Micro-Rocket Armor Mounting
description: Please see page 52 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Enables armor to fire loaded micro-rockets.

name: Replusor-Assisted Lifting
description: Please see page 52 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Tracking System
description: Please see page 52 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As a maneuver, may designate a target for tracking.  Only one target may be designated at a time.
Upgrade the ability of checks to track a designated target once.

name: Vaksai Modification Package
description: Please see page 60 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Containment Field
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Can hold one Silhouette 1 creature.  Creature can see, hear, and speak, but cannot move.
Operator can attack prisoner.  Prisoner must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Resilience check[b] and suffers 1 damage per [FA] and one [TH] may be used to inflict 1 strain.

name: Enhanced Prison Lockup
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Full incarceration and security suite for 2 prisoners.

added_mods.misc_desc: Support for one additional prisoner.

name: Minelayer
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Allows vehicle to carry a number of space mines equal to its silhouette.
Pilot or gunner may make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] to deploy a mine anywhere within close range.

added_mods.misc_desc: Increase deployable range to medium
Increase mine capacity by 1
